title: Nicolai roll up all-new Argon GX Gravel Bike w/ ample clearance and no weight limit
content:
Nicolai Bicycles have taken their first brave step into the world of gravel cycling, releasing the all-new Argon GX. This gravel bike joins the Nicolai CX, hardtail and road bikes of the Argon range, named after the inert gas used when welding the tubes together.
